## About myself

I'm a French medical student currently doing a PhD at Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory ([CSHL](https://www.cshl.edu/)). I'm working in the [Meyer lab](https://meyer-lab-cshl.github.io/), studying how the development of different T cell lineages is regulated in the human thymus.
